name: First Contact (Beta Version)
description:
Welcome to the First Contact Beta Version!

We are a very very small team and we are very excited to share our first game!! 

It's a casual 2D sci-fi space adventure for Mac or Windows. You are on an exploratory mission to find potential samples of alien life, but upon arriving at your destination, things don't go too smooth...

This Beta release is part of a feedback collection campaign for the final game, which will be released in the summer of 2018. Play our game, explore it, have fun and give us feedback by filling out this survey:

https://goo.gl/forms/mBpRQnfma59T7h802

For game development progress and teaser content see our instagram:

www.instagram.com/danielkleffmann

www.instagram.com/spydermk

Thank you !!
